about.title: About Me
about.text: I am a Web Developer with 4 years of experience from SMK Negeri 1 Cimahi. Currently working as a Backend Web Developer, I have substantial experience in building well-functioning systems with OOP principles, functional programming, RESTful/GraphQL API concepts, SOLID principles, database analysis, and project management using Git. I adapt different architectures based on needs, proficient with NodeJS, and currently learning Go.

techstack.title: Techstack
items: Basic Server Deployment (AWS, Azure, GCP, CI/CD & Kubernetes)

contact.title: Contact
contact.address: Jl. Pojok Selatan No.159 RT 001/RW 007, Kel. Setiamanah, Kec. Cimahi Tengah, Cimahi, 40524

details: Developing the backend for applications and websites such as TRACtoGo, E-Form, TRAC Reservation, etc.
Integrating with payment gateways like AstraPay and Xendit, KYC services with ASFIN and AsliRI, as well as internal integrations with AstraFMS.
Maintaining microservices and cloud services within the Microsoft Azure environment, such as Function Apps, Service Bus, API Management, and others.
Performing system improvements, refactoring, and optimizing existing legacy code.
Handling operational issues through the helpdesk according to the monthly on-call schedule.
Developing language and localization features into Indonesian.
Adding new question types such as Essay, Image-based, Matching, and an IRT (Item Response Theory) scoring system.
Creating a review system and answer analytics with statistical insights for students.
Maintaining the website and database for school/organization exams in collaboration with Crayonpedia.
Deploying servers using Docker and Kubernetes.
Participated in internship program at Metanouva Informatika
Designed Project Management System for Malaka9 Company Website
Designed Geolocation Information module for external companies

projects.title: Exam Crayonpedia
projects.description: Crayonpedia Exam platform offers features such as a Question Bank, Question Item Analysis, and Answer Review. Additionally, it supports five types of questions: Multiple Choice, Multi-Option, Short Answer, Essay, and Matching. The platform is developed using CodeIgniter and MySQL, with Docker utilized as the testing environment.

projects.title: TRACtoGo
projects.description: TRACtoGo is a Car and Bus Rental application available on Web, Android, and iOS. You can choose the vehicle you want, with or without a driver. Rental prices vary based on the type of vehicle available, but don't worryâ€”you can also nd exciting information and promotions on the app's main page. The backend is built with Laravel Lumen, while Node.js and TypeScript are used as the service integration middleware.

projects.title: Lapor.io
projects.description: Layanan Aspirasi Pengaduan Online Rakyat, or Lapor, is a project I created during vocational school, inspired by the design of the lapor.go.id website. Its function is to receive complaint reports and forward them to the appropriate authorities. This project was developed using Laravel and MySQL, with MaterializeCSS as the frontend template.

projects.title: EDZero
projects.description: EDZero is my personal web portfolio that is currently under development. It is being built with the latest technologies available, such as Laravel, Vue, TailwindCSS, Docker, and PostgreSQL. As for now, Im trying to rewrite this project with NextJS. This website will eventually be used for managing my portfolio and ongoing projects, as well as serving as a platform for my personal blog and client testimonials.
